name: TouchStars
short_description:
Navigate mazes and collect stars In TouchAction App's Touch Stars! In Touch Stars you don't control the Hero, you become the Hero! Use your finger to interact with the game environment in a way only possible on a touch screen in this iOS exclusive title. Challenge yourself with 23 levels and three difficulty settings. Collect stars, use transports, navigate ghosts. It's retro gaming in a whole new way!
